Definition at line 214 of file job.c.

rs_result rs_job_iter ( rs_job_t *  job,
rs_buffers_t *  buffers 
)

Run a rs_job_t state machine until it blocks (RS_BLOCKED), returns an error, or completes (::RS_COMPLETE).

Returns
The rs_result that caused iteration to stop.
Parameters
endingTrue if there is no more data after what's in the input buffer. The final block checksum will run across whatever's in there, without trying to accumulate anything else.
